title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 519/1999 of 9 March 1999 amending Regulation (EC) No 293/98 as regards the operative events applicable to the operational funds of producer organisations in the fruit and vegetable sector and to the storage aid for dried grapes and figs
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 519/1999 of 9 March 1999 amending Regulation (EC) No 293/98 as regards the operative events applicable to the operational funds of producer organisations in the fruit and vegetable sector and to the storage aid for dried grapes and figs
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Regulation (EC) No 293/98 is hereby amended as follows:
1. in Article 2, the following paragraph 4 is added:
'4. The operative event for the agricultural conversion rate applicable to the lump sum fixed in point 2 of the Annex to Regulation (EC) No 411/97 shall be 1 January in the year to which that amount applies.`;
2. in Article 8, paragraph 3 is replaced by the following:
'3. The operative event for the agricultural conversion rate applicable to the storage aid referred to in Article 9(4) of Regulation (EC) No 2201/96 shall be the first day of the month in respect of which the aid is granted.`

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
